name: My Girlfriend is a Cat Girl?!
summary:
In a quiet Japanese town lies a magical place resplendent with nature, and hidden among the town's human residents are people you never could have imagined were real…

When you're suddenly inflicted with a curse that seems impossible to lift, you find yourself thrown into a world of cat girls and wolf people straight out of a fairy tale. Your only hope of breaking the curse is to work alongside the cat girls in a little-known cafe, struggling to keep their hopes and dreams alive while seeking out the remedy for your magical affliction.

Despite the dire circumstances, working with these cute maids isn't all that bad…
